name: CÜBE
description:
My first ever game project. Nothing special really. But a starting point. 

Inspired by The World's Hardest Game.

As the name suggest (almost) everything is based on cubes. 

Finish the levels without losing health and in a time limit that isn't shown anwhere to get all 3 stars !!!

All sfx is made in sfxr.

BGM made by me in beepbox.co

Android version movement is slower. Helps with touch controls, since they suck.

This game is speedrunable but doesn't really have many many skips. It is possible to finish all 3 levels in around 5 minutes.
